title: Junior Website Designer Job at TeamAce Limited
content:
TeamAce Limited- Our client, an Edutech firm, is recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Junior Website Designer
Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	As the Junior Website Designer, you will be responsible for designing, updating, and maintaining websites to ensure a seamless user experience and alignment with our brand.


Responsibilities
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Assist in designing and developing responsive websites using WordPress.
	Customize themes and plugins to meet project requirements.
	Maintain and update website content, ensuring accuracy and consistency.
	Collaborate with design, marketing, and development teams to execute web projects.
	Troubleshoot and resolve basic technical issues related to layout, formatting, or plugin compatibility.


Requirements


	Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field
	Minimum of 1 year of experience in web design with a strong focus on WordPress.
	Familiarity with Adobe Creative Suite, Figma, or similar design tools is a plus.


Salary
NGN 200,000 - NGN250,000 per month.

title: Customer Service Representative Job at TeamAce Limited

title: 3D Animator and Motion Graphics Artist Job at E-mmerx World Limited
content:
E-mmerx World is a leading immersive technology company pioneering 3D visuals, interactive experiences, and virtual environments for clients across education, retail, and entertainment. We blend creativity with cutting-edge technology to craft unforgettable stories and elevate brands.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: 3D Animator and Motion Graphics Artist

Job Location: Ikeja, Lagos (Onsite)
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities
What You will Do:
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Animate 3D characters, environments & assets
	Design dynamic 2D/3D motion graphics (After Effects, Nuke)
	Plan and execute virtual cinematography: framing, lighting & camera moves
	Collaborate on storyboards, animatics and integrate feedback across teams
	Optimize scenes for web, mobile, VR/AR performance


Requirements


	2+ years in 3D animation & motion graphics
	Strong reel showcasing character/environment work, cinematic shots & motion design
	Solid grasp of animation principles, timing & visual storytelling
	Proficiency in at least two 3D tools + After Effects; familiarity with Premiere/Resolve.


Why You will Love It


	Competitive pay + benefits
	Growth opportunities
	Work on high-impact, innovative projects


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and portfolioto to: careers@e-mmerx.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

title: Personal Assistant Job at Titan Sales Limited
content:
Titan Sales Limited is a sales, marketing, and distribution firm committed to helping our bluechip client increase sales while reducing costs. We handle premium technological products within the automotive industry, driving change through high quality products is one of our mantras at Titan Sales Limited.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Personal Assistant
Job Location: Gudu, Abuja (FCT) 
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We're seeking an exceptional Personal Assistant to provide high-level administrative support to an executive.
	The ideal candidate will be highly organized, proactive, and possess excellent communication skills.


Job Description
The ideal candidate must possess the following skills and capabilities:


	Manage schedules, calendars, and travel arrangements
	Prepare correspondence, reports, and presentations
	Handle confidential matters with discretion
	Coordinate meetings, events, and projects
	Develop and maintain systems for efficient workflow
	Liaise with teams, clients, and stakeholders


Requirements


	Minimum academic qualification: B.Sc.
	Proven work experience as a Personal Assistant.
	Knowledge of office management systems and procedures.
	Outstanding organizational and time management skills.
	Up-to-date with the latest office gadgets and applications.
	Knowledge of accounting and auditing systems.
	Proficiency in MS Office and English.
	Ability to multitask and prioritize daily workload.
	Excellent verbal and written communications skills.
	Discretion and confidentiality.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: humanresources@titansales.ltd using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

title: Store Officer Job at Ascentech Services Limited
content:
Ascentech Services Limited - Our client is recruiting suitable candidates to fill the position below:

Job Position: Store Officer
Job Location: Victoria Island, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We are hiring for our client, a detail-oriented and organized Store Officer to manage inventory, track stock levels, and ensure efficient store operations.
	The ideal candidate must have hands-on experience with Odoo software and a few years of experience in a similar role.


Key Responsibilities
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Maintain accurate records of stock movement using Odoo software.
	Monitor inventory levels and ensure timely replenishment of stock.
	Receive, inspect, and document incoming goods.
	Ensure proper storage and labeling of goods to maintain order and efficiency.
	Collaborate with procurement and other departments for effective inventory control.
	Issue materials as per requisitions while ensuring proper documentation.
	Conduct periodic stock audits to reconcile discrepancies.
	Generate reports on stock levels, usage trends, and discrepancies.
	Adhere to safety and quality standards within the store.


Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess a B.Sc Degree with 2-4 years of experience in storekeeping, inventory control, or a related role.
	Proficiency in using Odoo software for inventory management.
	Strong analytical and organizational skills.
	Attention to detail and accuracy in record-keeping.
	Ability to work independently and manage store operations efficiently.
	Good communication and interpersonal skills.
	Must be available for a physical Interview.


Salary
N100,000 - N150,000 per month.  

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: cv@ascentech.com.ng using the Job Position as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply
